transArray.content: The room is clean and tidy, the restaurant has various varieties and is very hygienic, and the staff is enthusiastic. I will choose Hanting next time

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Hanting! The hotel's breakfast is a combination of Chinese and Western, buffet style, with various varieties and rich nutrition. It is deeply loved by the majority of tourists! I see that you like our pastries and snacks very much during your stay this time, and I am looking forward to it very much. You can come back to the hotel for a taste. The hotel has also added a self-service laundry room, dryer, and delivery robot. It is also very close to Chaoyang High-speed Railway Station and Joy City, which is very convenient. We look forward to your visit again!
